name: facebook-chatbot-workflow
description: Facebook Chatbot Workflow Builder with React Flow and XState

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.reset:db: cd database && docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d
